title: YMDUCH Women's Sexy Deep V Neck Cap Sleeve A-line Mini Club Party Dress
description: Fabric: Double layer fabric will not see through, polyester and spandex components, fabric micro-elastic.

Features: Fashion deep V-neck, A-line dress and cap sleeve design, more playful and cute, the side has decorative fake pockets design, make the whole skirt more fashionable; The back has invisible zipper design, easy to put on and take off, the overall dress is stylish and cute.
Size: the fabric is a micro stretch, refer to the size chart for details,US size: S = US 4-6, M = 8-10, L = 12-14, XL = 14-16.
Occasion: Suitable for parties, clubs, dates, cocktail parties, nightclubs, etc., but also suitable for some festivals, such as Valentine's Day, Halloween, birthday parties, etc.
Collocation: Can be worn with stockings, high heels, etc., because the style is relatively sexy, the dress belongs to the A-word mini, it is recommended to wear safety shorts.
